description: Enable LLMs to automate web browsing tasks remotely using BrowserCat's cloud browser service. Interact with web pages by navigating, clicking, filling forms, taking screenshots, and executing JavaScript without local browser installation. Monitor console logs and capture screenshots seamlessly for enhanced web interaction workflows.

capabilities.name: browsercat_screenshot
capabilities.description: Take a screenshot of the current page or a specific element

capabilities.name: browsercat_click
capabilities.description: Click an element on the page

capabilities.name: browsercat_select
capabilities.description: Select an option from a dropdown menu

capabilities.name: browsercat_hover
capabilities.description: Hover over an element on the page

capabilities.name: browsercat_evaluate
capabilities.description: Execute JavaScript in the browser console
